settings.title: Careers at Sweet Water DECOR
settings.subheading:
Interested in applying? Email your resume to:
careers@sweetwaterdecor.com

settings.title: About The Position
settings.text:
Location:

Sweet Water Decor is a growing online retailer seeking an excellent Graphic Design Associate to join our team! You will be working on product design, graphic design, and more alongside our Creative and Design Manager! Each day will be different as you dream up and work on products / visuals.

Hours:

Position can be contractor or full / part time.  Benefits apply to Full Time only.

 Full Time Benefits Include:

  • 401K (and matching) after one year
  • Paid Vacation
  • Paid Holidays
  • Paid Sick Days
  • Healthcare / Dental / Eye Insurance
  • Employee discount

settings.title: Responsibilities
settings.text:
Job Description:

You will be working on product design, graphic design, and more alongside our Creative and Design Manager! Each day will be different as you dream up and work on products / visuals.

Job responsibilities can include (but not limited to):

  • Product graphics
  • Product design
  • Updating product catalogs 
  • Sales channel visual merchandising 
  • Working with our team to dream up new products, label / box designs, new product and existing product initiatives and more
  • Reviewing product samples
  • Creating gifs for marketing 
  • Designing digital products (phone cases, invitations, art, Canva templates, Etsy downloadable files, managing custom product orders - mugs, and more)
  • Works directly with Creative Manager
  • Works on digital / photo files to showcase our products on our different sales platforms

Additional Skills (not required):

  • Product Videography (short clips to highlight product features)
  • Experience with iMovie or other video editing software

settings.title: QUALIFICATIONS
settings.text:
Minimum Qualifications:

  • 2+ years experience in design
  • Experience working in Adobe Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, Lightroom, InDesign, XD.)
  • Apple/iMac user preferred 
  • Experience with Amazon Storefront/A+ Content/Amazon Graphics preferred
  • Great people skills
  • Strong ability to work independently as well as in a team environment / cross functionally
  • Ability to learn quickly and continuously improving skills and knowledge
  • Thorough understanding of design principles / branding
  • Well-organized and detail oriented

settings.title: About The Position
settings.text:
Location: In office @ SWD Headquarters - Cranberry Twp., PA 16066, with optional 1 day work at home per week

Hours: The position is full time (8 hr / day) | 40 hr/wk

Benefits Include:

  • 401K (and matching) after one year
  • Paid Vacation
  • Paid Holidays
  • Paid Sick Days
  • Healthcare / Dental / Eye Insurance
  • Employee discount

Job Description:

Sweet Water Decor is a growing online retailer seeking an excellent Digital Marketing Specialist. You will play an essential role in strategizing, conducting market research, and analyzing marketing initiatives to bring them to life! From running our social media to ensuring our ads are top notch, you'll have a key role in the marketing of our company. You’ll keep an eye on market trends, Google analytics, and create advertising campaigns, plan out social / ad marketing campaigns, work closely with our social media affiliates, and more! You will be an integral part of the development and execution of marketing plans to reach targets from brand awareness to product promotion.

settings.title: RESPONSIBILITIES
settings.text:
Job responsibilities include:

  • Analyze, plan, and implement all marketing campaigns and strategy
  • Design and plan all emails and text message (SMS) campaigns
  • Social marketing campaigns, posts, strategy, and analytics
  • Creates content for video / reels for social media and more
  • Analyze and implement Ads / content on Facebook, Instagram, Etsy, Google, LTK, Pinterest, and more
  • Develop and manage the content calendar
  • Owns giveaways and partners with teams on partnerships/community events 
  • Conducts market research
  • Owns our affiliate marketing strategy, platforms, and campaigns
  • Plans and writes blog posts
  • Works with partners to manage the Amazon platform (ads, posting, etc.)
  • Plans all marketing material for digital, inserts, etc.
  • Undertake individual tasks of a marketing plan as assigned or as strengths show (SEO, copywriting, photography / videography, etc.)

settings.title: QUALIFICATIONS
settings.text:
Minimum Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing, Communication, or related field
  • 3+ years experience in business marketing and social media management
  • Able to analyze and strategize marketing from a numerical and creative eye
  • Facebook ad experience a plus
  • Proven experience as marketing coordinator / specialist or similar role
  • Strong ability to work independently and with other team members / cross functionally
  • Ability to learn on the fly and continuously improving skillset and knowledge
  • Have a self-starter mindset  
  • Thorough understanding of marketing elements (including traditional and digital marketing such as SEO/Social media etc.) and market research methods
  • Able to grasp consumer behavior trends and generate creative ideas
  • Well-versed in specialized marketing concepts, principles and tactics
  • Solid computer and analysis skills, including use of Google Docs / Sheets / Affiliate Marketing Programs / Marketing programs + applications (Google Analytics, Google Ads, ShareASale, Monday, Klaviyo, etc.)
  • Well-organized and detail-oriented
  • Exceptional communication and writing skills
  • Commercial awareness partnered with a creative mind

settings.title: About The Position
settings.text:
Location: 

In office @ SWD Headquarters - Cranberry Twp., PA 16066, with optional 1 day work at home per week

Hours: 

The position is full time (8 hr / day) | 40 hr/wk

Job Description:

Sweet Water Decor is a growing online retailer seeking an excellent Inventory Planner / Buyer to join our team! You will be responsible for forecasting and managing all sales / inventory / products and creating buy and purchasing plans. You will be sourcing and researching product and product components, and ensuring we are always in stock on all sales channels. 

Benefits Include:

  • 401K (and matching) after one year
  • Paid Vacation
  • Paid Holidays
  • Healthcare / Dental / Eye Insurance
  • Employee discount

settings.title: Responsibilities
settings.text:
Job Responsibilities Include:

  • Analyzing and forecasting sales and inventory
  • Creating and reconciling Amazon FBAs to ensure products are always in stock on Amazon
  • Working and negotiating with suppliers to bring in samples, order new products
  • Work with logistical partners to ensure products ship and arrive on time
  • Develops and maintains professional knowledge regarding the market drivers, market trends, economic forecasts, supplier base, and competitive intelligence
  • Analyzes material demand and determines inventory strategy or alternative supply chain strategies for maintaining high material availability at the lowest total ownership costs
  • Research, analyze, and plan inventory / new initiatives based on retail trend
  • Generating Purchase Orders, communicating PO’s to suppliers, receiving acknowledgements, and performing PO maintenance as needed
  • Creates and forecasts candle pour schedule
  • Deep dives into sales of each product on each sales platform and develops forecasting models and markdown schedules
  • Responsible for sales, inventory, and revenue forecasting
  • Works with other departments on sales and marketing initiatives, product launches, sales, and more
  • Understands production and warehouse capacities when forecasting / buying

settings.title: Qualifications
settings.text:
Minimum Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s Degree in Business, Finance, or related field
  • 3+ years experience in retail / manufacturing / inventory analytics or buying
  • Proven experience as an analyst and forecasting
  • Strong people skills
  • Strong ability to work independently as well as in a team environment / cross functionally
  • Ability to learn quickly and continuously improving skills and knowledge
  • Thorough understanding of sales analytics
  • Solid computer and analysis skills, including use of Google Docs / Sheets
  • Well-organized and detail oriented
  • Exceptional communication and writing skills

settings.title: About The Position
settings.text:
Location:

In office @ SWD Headquarters - Cranberry Twp., PA 16066, with optional 1 day work at home per week

Hours:

The position is full time (8 hr / day) | 40 hr/wk

Job Description:

Sweet Water Decor is a growing online
retailer seeking an excellent Project Manager. This role is responsible
for overseeing the Sales/Operations and Marketing departments to create
company cohesion through team leadership, analysis, strategy, and
sales/operational goals. The Operations and Strategy Manager will work
closely with the CEO to bring direction to the company’s departments.

Benefits Include:

  • 401K (and matching) after one year
  • Paid Vacation
  • Paid Holidays
  • Healthcare / Dental / Eye Insurance
  • Employee discount

settings.title: Responsibilities
settings.text:
Job responsibilities include:

  • Set project timeline
  • Monitor project deliverables
  • Update relevant stakeholders or team members on the project progress
  • Coach and support project team members with tasks you assign them
  • Analyze and project sales on all platforms
  • Creates operational / business / sales goals and plans
  • Support and manage business areas including sales, operations, and marketing
  • Oversees all office / remote team members - (approximately 7 team members)
  • Sets and reviews goals for each team member and their respective department
  • Owns product launch initiatives and works with all departments to ensure a successful launch

Oversees all inventory and sales platforms

Analyzes, oversees, implements, and works with team members to ensure all business and operation strategies are in working order

Communicates strategy to team / cohesion between between all departments

Understands / reviews / oversees all sales platforms and business platforms / apps 

Creates individual goals / strategy and reviews all platforms

Deep dives into each area / analyzes how to grow the business / sales while reducing expenses

Analyzes all business ops from sales to marketing

Works with each office team member and department on day to day activities / goals / initiatives

Sees the big picture operationally with production / warehouse / sales

Creates revenue forecasts and works with departments to work on meeting goals

Works on growth opportunities

settings.title: Qualifications
settings.text:
Minimum Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s Degree in Business, Finance, or related field
  • 5+ years experience in retail / manufacturing / inventory analytics or buying
  • Must have proven experience in a managerial role and managing teams
  • Proven experience as an analyst and business forecasting
  • Exceptional communication, team building, and people skills
  • Strong ability to work independently and with other team members / cross functionally
  • Team building and business building skills
  • Strong business acumen in project planning and management
  • Strong verbal, written, and organizational skills
  • Ability to learn quickly and continuously improving skills and knowledge
  • Thorough understanding of sales analytics
  • Solid computer and analysis skills, including use of Google Docs / Sheets
  • Well-organized and detail oriented

settings.title: About The Position
settings.text:
Location:

Sweet Water Decor is looking for a Production Supervisor in Cranberry Township, PA.

Hours:

Afternoon shift. Candle Maker and Production Hours: 12-8 pm. Full Time (evening). Monday through Friday.

Salary: 

$18.00 - $22.00 per hour

Job Benefits:

  • 401(k) & matching
  • Dental insurance
  • Employee discount
  • Flexible schedule
  • Health insurance
  • Paid time off
  • Retirement plan
  • Vision insurance

settings.title: Responsibilities
settings.text:
Job Responsibilities:

  • Establish daily٫ weekly and monthly objectives and communicate them to employees
  • Manage the workflow by assigning responsibilities and preparing schedules
  • Guide and coach employees٫ monitoring their productivity
  • Detect issues in efficiency and suggest improvements
  • Ensure strict adherence to safety guidelines and company standards

settings.title: Qualifications
settings.text:
Minimum Qualifications:

  • 2+ years' experience of working on a Production Supervisor or other similar position
  • Capacity to bend, flex, lift 50 pounds, stand for 6-7 hours
  • Communicate daily with coworkers
  • Ability to work in diverse teams
  • Move at a rapid pace
  • Must have good hand-eye coordination

settings.title: About the Position
settings.text:
Location:

Sweet Water Decor is looking for a Candle Maker / Production Specialist in Cranberry Township, PA.

Hours:

The position has flexible, full-time, daytime hours. 8 hour shift, Monday to Friday. Full-time position.

Job Benefits:

  • 401(k) & 401(k) matching
  • Dental insurance
  • Employee discount
  • Flexible schedule
  • Health insurance
  • Paid time off
  • Retirement plan
  • Vision insurance

settings.title: Responsibilities
settings.text:
Job Description:

You will play an essential role in the task at the heart of our business: delivering high-quality products to our worldwide customer base. The Sweet Water Decor warehouse offers a fast-paced, friendly environment, with advancement opportunities for employees who demonstrate the ability to excel in their position.

Job responsibilities include:

  • Picking items from numbered and alphabetical locations
  • Packing customer orders according to the shipping method
  • Receiving products and matching items to purchase orders
  • Stocking items appropriately
  • Other miscellaneous warehouse duties as directed
  • Periodic Inventory Duties

settings.title: Qualifications
settings.text:
Minimum Qualifications:

  • Ability to walk, bend, stoop, reach, etc. for extended periods of time
  • Must be computer literate
  • Need to have reliable transportation
  • Flexibility in schedule
  • Positive attitude and desire to work within a team environment
  • High School Diploma/GED and College Graduates preferred
  • Previous warehouse/retail experience is a plus but not required.

settings.title: About The Position
settings.text:
Location:

Sweet Water Decor is looking for a Candle Maker / Production Specialist in Cranberry Township, PA.

Hours:

  • Hiring - Multiple Positions
  • Full Time (Daytime OR Evening)
  • Monday through Friday

Benefits:

  • 401(k) & 401(k) matching
  • Dental insurance
  • Employee discount
  • Flexible schedule
  • Health insurance
  • Paid time off
  • Retirement plan
  • Vision insurance

settings.title: Responsibilities
settings.text:
Job Responsibilities:

  • Visually inspect each container for correct dimensions and labeling
  • Assist with prepping, pouring, and labeling candles
  • Must have good hand dexterity
  • Maintain a clean work environment
  • This is a fast-paced work setting

settings.title: Qualifications
settings.text:
Minimum Qualifications:

  • High school diploma or GED equivalent
  • Capacity to bend, flex, lift 50 pounds, stand for 6-7 hours
  • Communicate daily with coworkers
  • Ability to work in diverse teams
  • Move at a rapid pace
  • Must have good hand-eye coordination
